full_summary:
# Notice of Solicitation (Request for Proposal)

**Project Title:** Provision of Simultaneous Interpretation Equipment and Services

**Description:**

The Senate of Canada is inviting proposals to establish a Standing Offer Agreement (SO) for Provision of Simultaneous Interpretation Equipment and Services. The term of the SO will be three (3) years with the option to renew for three (3) additional one-year periods. Proposals should meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation document available at [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40472/finproc_rfso_sen-013-24-25_simultaneous-interpretation_final_06182024_e_c.pdf).

**Enquiries and Clarifications:**

Bidders are required to submit enquiries and clarification requests in writing via email at [proc-appr@sen.parl.gc.ca](mailto:proc-appr@sen.parl.gc.ca). Please reference the solicitation number and clearly mark proprietary questions. Enquires must be received by July 4, 2024, at 11:00 a.m. EDT to ensure a response.

**Submission Requirements:**

Bidders must submit their proposals electronically by July 16, 2024, at 11:00 a.m. EDT.

**Important Documents:**

Please refer to the solicitation document and amendments available on [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40472/addendum-01_rfp_sen-013-2425_final_e.pdf).

**Public Notice:**

This solicitation is open to all qualified bidders. The selection will be based on a Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

# Contact Information

* Name: Shirley Chartrand
* Email: [proc-appr@sen.parl.gc.ca](mailto:proc-appr@sen.parl.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 995-8888
* Address: 40 Elgin Street, 11th floor, Ottawa, ON K1A 0A4
